Edge Case Annotations.Invalid Bet Amount: require(msg.value == 10 ether) prevents bets with amounts other than 10 ether.
Edge Case Annotations.Multiple Bets Per Block: require(now != pastBlockTime) prevents multiple bets from the same block.
Common Attack Patterns.Time Manipulation: now % 15 check can potentially be influenced if the miner manipulates block timestamp.
Recovery Mechanisms: No specific recovery mechanisms, such as an emergency stop, are implemented in this contract.
